segments.text: Hah ! For three hours while you threw up . And Femi dumped me for that . I really loved her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so sorry , Taylor . Go talk to her . I'm sure she'd be happy to see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She probably wouldn't even recognize me . She's probably married .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yi-jun said Femi was talking about you . So get out there , Tiger !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Was she really ? So you're telling me there's a chance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't hurt to try . Carpe diem . Who can say if we'll be here tomorrow or not ?
segments.speaker: S2
